data.title: Passions - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Passions with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
1999-2008

2 Seasons

NBC

Drama, Soap, Science Fiction

TV14

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Perhaps the wildest soap since 'Dark Shadows' takes place in the seldom harmonious Harmony, where the occult meets an array of conflicts between the wealthy Cranes and the salty Lopez-Fitzgeralds. Throw in a centuries-old witch, an orangutan nurse, one never-seen patriarch and a large, diverse cast and you have a cult hit that's lived down its scandalous debut, which rankled viewers---many of them upset about the show replacing the beloved 'Another World'---with a tacky Princess Di subplot.
